The class that holds the list of marked shapes.

Method Detail

instance

public static AbstractShape instance()
Gets an instance of the marked shape. If there are more than one, the last added (in the list) is returned.

markShape

public static void markShape(AbstractShape s)
Marks a shape by placing it in the list of marked shapes. If the control key is not pressed, the list is emptied first.

paint

public static void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
Draws a border around the marked shapes.
